references.paper_title: The link prediction problem for social networks
references.reason: This paper introduces the link prediction problem, a cornerstone task in graph machine learning, which this paper builds upon.

references.paper_title: Neural Message Passing for Quantum Chemistry
references.reason: This paper introduces the Message Passing Neural Networks (MPNNs) framework, which is central to the methods in this paper.

references.paper_title: Semi-Supervised Classification with Graph Convolutional Networks
references.reason: This paper introduces Graph Convolutional Networks (GCNs), a fundamental type of graph neural network used as a baseline in this paper.

references.paper_title: Link Prediction Based on Graph Neural Networks
references.reason: This paper is a key link prediction work using graph neural networks that is compared against in this paper.

references.paper_title: Neural Bellman-Ford Networks: A general graph neural network framework for link prediction
references.reason: This paper provides another strong baseline for link prediction using graph neural networks that is compared to the methods proposed in this paper.
